MediaControllerProxy * mpProxy

Detailed Description

A view containing controls for a MediaPlayer.

The following example demonstrates how to use the MediaControl

      Scene* scene = Scene::SceneFactory(this);
      LinearController* linearController = new LinearController(this);

      // Create a VideoWidget instance.
      VideoWidget* videoWidget = new VideoWidget(this);

      // Create a MediaControl instance.
      MediaControl* mediaControl = new MediaControl(this);

      // Set Anchor for MediaControl
      mediaControl->setAnchorView(videoWidget);

      // Set the path of the video source.
      videoWidget->setVideoURI(Uri::parse(String("/sdcard/test.mp4")));
      videoWidget->setMediaController(*mediaControl);

      linearController->addWidget(videoWidget);
      scene->attachController(mpCtrl);
      scene->setupSceneLayout();

virtual void gaia::ui::MediaControl::show ( ) [virtual]

Show the controller on screen.

It will go away automatically after 3 seconds of inactivity.

virtual void gaia::ui::MediaControl::show ( int32_t  timeout) [virtual]

Show the controller on screen.

It will go away automatically according to this setting.

Parameters:
timeoutSet controller to show within how many milliseconds.
